caption_text:
Hey! If you’re new here —welcome. I’m Amanda: psychic, medium, energy worker, guide, and DJ.

I wasn’t always doing this. I spent years in advertising and club DJing, chasing what I thought success was —disconnected from my body and truth.

Getting sober 7 years ago shifted things. A traumatic experience took me deeper, and I threw myself into trauma work (which, in hindsight, I DO NOT ever recommend doing so aggressively).

A wild spiritual awakening followed — complete with premonition dreams, mystical experiences I couldn’t explain, and an accidental mediumship reading. I left advertising and have been stepping into this work ever since. 

Now, I guide others home to themselves through energy work, channeling, and soul remembrance.

As a half Palestinian woman, I believe healing is a radical act— and part of building a more loving, just world.

Glad you’re here 🫶🏼

If you’re curious to know more, drop a comment or shoot me a DM if something resonates. 

#spiritualawakening 
#spiritualhealing 
#healingjourney 
#energyworker 
#lightworkersofinstagram
